alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 21 at 8:21PM CDT until July 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 481 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 29 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI SUNFLOWER IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI CLAIBORNE IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, DE KALB, DECATUR, DELHI, DURANT, EPPS, EUPORA, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, MERIDIAN, MORTON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, OAK GROVE, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, SCOOBA, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, TALLULAH, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WEST POINT, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
